project1Description: Optimize the SEO of an existing website, with minifying, lazy loading, and image optimization and of course the referencing labels.
project2Description: Simple renting application front-end only, it was an introduction to React.
project3Description: A mobile first restaurants app, with a focus on animations and transitions, first steps into SASS.
project4Description: Utilization of Next.JS, Drizzle ORM, PostgreSQL, Server Actions, Stripe, ShadcnUI, TailwindCSS, first time I create an admin dashboard(React Admin).
project5Description: Fan of the Tekken franchise I wanted to do a reveal animation of the trailer. Utilization of Next.JS, GSAP,TailwindCSS.
project6Description: A website for a tobacco and press shop in Le Soler, featuring accessibility features, map integration, and responsive design. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and a bit of GSAP.
project7Description: First time on WordPress.This is a blog for the USAP rugby team, showcasing news, match results, and historical highlights. Includes Twitter integration and responsive design.
